    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases all of the textures associated with this atlas.

      • releaseTexture

        public void releaseTexture​(int textureId)
        Releases the specified atlas texture.
        Parameters:
        textureId - The texture ID

      • getTextureKey

        public long getTextureKey​(java.lang.String uri)
        Returns the atlas key associated with the specified URI. If the atlas does not contain the image associated with the specified URI, 0L is returned.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI
        Returns:
        The key associated with the specified URI, or 0L if the atlas does not contain an entry for the URI.

      • isFixedImageSize

        public boolean isFixedImageSize()
        Returns true if all images in the atlas are of a fixed size, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if all images in the atlas are of a fixed size, false otherwise.

      • getImageRect

        public android.graphics.RectF getImageRect​(long key)
        Returns a RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key. If the atlas does not contain an entry for the specified key, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        A RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key.

      • getImageRect

        public android.graphics.RectF getImageRect​(long key,
                                           boolean normalized)
        Returns a RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key. If the atlas does not contain an entry for the specified key, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        normalized - If true, the returned RectF will have its members normalized as texel values per the size of the texture containing the image.
        Returns:
        A RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key.

      • getImageRect

        public android.graphics.RectF getImageRect​(long key,
                                           boolean normalized,
                                           android.graphics.RectF rect)
        Returns a RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key. If the atlas does not contain an entry for the specified key, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        normalized - If true, the returned RectF will have its members normalized as texel values per the size of the texture containing the image.
        rect - An optionally pre-allocated RectF instance that will have its members set to the bounds of the image associated with the key. If null is specified, a new instance will be allocated and returned.
        Returns:
        A RectF describing the bounds of the image associated with the specified key.

      • getImageWidth

        public int getImageWidth​(long key)
        Returns the width of the image associated with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The width of the image associated with the specified key or 0 if the atlas does not contain an entry for the key.

      • getImageHeight

        public int getImageHeight​(long key)
        Returns the height of the image associated with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The height of the image associated with the specified key or 0 if the atlas does not contain an entry for the key.

      • getTextureSize

        public int getTextureSize()
        Returns the size of the textures used by the atlas. The value returned by this method should be used to compute texel positions.
        Returns:
        The size of the textures used by the atlas.

      • getTexId

        public int getTexId​(long key)
        Returns the texture ID containing the data for the image associated with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The texture ID containing the data for the image associated with the specified key.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex​(long key)
        Returns the index for the entry containing the data for the image associated with the specified key. The result of this method can be used to compute the bounds of the image for fixed image size atlases.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The index for the entry containing the data for the image associated with the specified key.

      • getImageTextureOffsetX

        public int getImageTextureOffsetX​(long key)
        Returns the x-coordinate of the origin of the image in the texture.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The x-coordinate of the origin of the image in the texture or 0 if the atlas does not contain an entry for the specified key.

      • getImageTextureOffsetY

        public int getImageTextureOffsetY​(long key)
        Returns the y-coordinate of the origin of the image in the texture.
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The y-coordinate of the origin of the image in the texture or 0 if the atlas does not contain an entry for the specified key.

      • addImage

        public long addImage​(java.lang.String uri,
                     android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Adds the specified image to the atlas. The image will be resized if the atlas uses fixed size images and the dimensions of the bitmap are not equal to the fixed size specified during instantiation.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI associated with the image
        bitmap - The image data
        Returns:
        The atlas key for the entry that was created.
